argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdscmnd.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 2 |  | prdscmnd.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 3 |  | prdscmnd.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 4 |  | prdsgabld.r | |- ( ph -> R : I --> Abel ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ablgrp | |- ( a e. Abel -> a e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ssriv | |- Abel C_ Grp |
| 7 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( R : I --> Abel /\ Abel C_ Grp ) -> R : I --> Grp ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> R : I --> Grp ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 8 | #P_prdsgrpd | |- ( ph -> Y e. Grp ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( a e. Abel -> a e. CMnd ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ssriv | |- Abel C_ CMnd |
| 12 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( R : I --> Abel /\ Abel C_ CMnd ) -> R : I --> CMnd ) |
| 13 | 4, 11, 12 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> R : I --> CMnd ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 13 | #P_prdscmnd | |- ( ph -> Y e. CMnd ) |
| 15 |  | #P_isabl | |- ( Y e. Abel <-> ( Y e. Grp /\ Y e. CMnd ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 14, 15 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> Y e. Abel ) |
